ygData.subject: Re: Best two spells in the game...!?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Not many are, I think! The aqua goblins will con blue to a level 16 bard, perfect place to go with one or two friends, or even more, when the bard gets the
ygData.messageBody:
>Is this the ocean near Oasis, or in the lake? I wasn't aware
>there were aqua goblins in the zone.
>
Not many are, I think!

The aqua goblins will con blue to a level 16 bard, perfect place to go with
one or two friends, or even more, when the bard gets the song. The aqua
goblins have claimed a structure in the bottom of the lake, similar to
towers with the ladders in places like Misty. Easiest way to find it is go
to the fisherman and their shacks (the fellows with halberds), dive in from
there and head straight out.

I've heard of the shipwreck, and plan to visit that, thanks for the
directions!

Roop


>From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
>Another place worth investigating is the shipwreck off Wisp
>Isle in Erudin's Crossing. There is a sharp dropoff behind
>the wreck. My friend and I went down the dropoff. I stopped
>because I lost sight of him but he went a bit further and
>swears he saw a fish or mermaid down there. I plan to explore
>it more fully in the future.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
